title: MODIS Combined 16-Day NDVI
description: This Normalized Difference Vegetation Index is an index of greenness generated from MODIS satellite imagery. Google Earth Engine provides streamlined access for users to pull spatially and temporally specific data.
display_note: Google Earth Engine is free to use for research, education, and nonprofit use. Original data can be found through NASA's LP DAAC.
creator: Kamel Didan
publisher: Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
subject: Food Environment
Health and Healthcare
Neighborhood and Built Environment
Greenspaces
rights: MODIS data and products acquired through the LP DAAC have no restrictions on subsequent use, sale, or redistribution.
methods_variables: BRDF Albedo Mandatory Quality for Band 3
BRDF Albedo Mandatory Quality for Band 4
NBAR at local solar noon for Band 3
NBAR at local solar noon for Band 4
